quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因形近词“station”（车站）或词根拆分错误（将“staycation”误拆为“stay”+“cation”理解为“停留的状态”）而误解其义。
quiz_item.sentence: To save money and avoid crowds, they chose a **staycation** this year—we spent most days at home reading, cooking, and visiting nearby museums.

option.definition: 居家度假（待在家里或附近的度假）
